metadata.title: CVE-2023-5512 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from16.3 before 16.4.4, all versions starting from 16.5 before 16.5.4, allversions starting from 16.6 before 16.6.2. File integrity may becompromised when specific HTML encoding is used for file names leading forincorrect representation in the UI.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
